Features: Functional Baby Walker: BABY JOY sit to stand walker combines the walker, and game panel together. Unlike the traditional rounded baby walker that centers on tiptoe, this sit-to-stand learning walker makes toddler walk while pushing and applies balanced force to both feet so as to effectively avoid bow-legged walking. And pyramid structure allows three points to support body, preventing rollover. Detachable Play Panel: The detachable panel with lighting effects and cute buttons shape features a variety of functions, such as 20 melodies, 6 children's songs, 5 animal songs, animal words and 26 English letters for baby to play and learn. The panel can fully exercise babys hand-eye coordination and stimulate their curiosity. Weight Gain Design: This baby walker can gain weight by filling some water, sand or other heavy objects in the water tank and hollow hind legs. You can customize the weight of the walker according to your baby's strength, making your baby walk more steadily and safely. Speed Control: The tire of this sit-to-stand learning walker is covered with a non-slip rubber ring, which can increase the friction with the ground and change acceleration capability. And the rear wheel can be adjusted to a proper speed to meet the needs of babies in different stages of walking. Safe & Durable Material: Made of high-quality materials, this sit-to-stand walker is durable for baby's long-term health use. At the same time, the walker has fully tested with ASTM to give your baby the safest walking experience.

Description: PortaPlay Stage-based Baby Activity Center! The first Baby Activity Center with 2 sets of age-appropriate toys. Unlike other exersaucers out there, our new PortaPlay supports your baby's holistic development at two specific yet distinct phases (5 to 8 months and 8 to 12 months). We understand that the needs of a 6-month old are different from those of a 10-month, so why should the toys of Activity Center remain the same? There's tonnes of learning and even more fun packed in every stage-based toy of our new PortaPlay! For instance, this Stage-2 toy 'Pushey Pulley' encourages babies to push and pull the cloth-monsters. It builds their motor skills for sure, but the pushing and pulling also challenges baby to anticipate which cloth monster will get sucked in.  Different fabrics and texture on the base provide tactile stimulation to their little fingers. It's also great for mouthing, so of course we have made the monsters machine-washable! Not only does it stimulate her brain development, our PortaPlay supports your baby's physical needs with its 4-level height adjustment. We recommend your baby to be on tippy toes while in the Activity Center. When she has grown taller with limited room for bouncing, its time to raise the Activity Center one level higher. The color of PortaPlay is meant to blend perfectly with a modern home. Aesthetically pleasing and minimal, like Oribel products! Adorable, friendly monsters provide the right-level of visual stimulation and are guaranteed to bring giggles. The PortaPlay is intentionally gender-neutral, as every toy in 2020 should be! Worried about it taking space in your compact home? We get it! With a push of a button, you can easily snap the legs and store your PortaPlay away. PortaPlay is designed to be child safe and made of the highest quality materials. Like all Oribel products it meets and exceed the ASTM and EN standards.  All mouthable parts of this Portaplay are made with food grade silicon so your baby is never chewing on hard plastic. All fabric used in toys or seat are machine washable! Like the rest of the PortaPlay range, it is a safe way for your baby to have some independent play time (giving you a much-needed break!) and when converted to its activity table form, it can be used up till your child is five years old, making it a great long-term investment. Grow together with PortaPlay Stage-based Activity Center       Read more STAGE 1 TOYS (EARLY DEVELOPMENT TOYS)         This frown-y rattle toy wobbles and jiggles and makes a rattling sound when pushed by little hands, once again hones fine motor skills and eye-hand coordination. It encourages babies to grab, twist and whack it!  Graphic mode: This toy comes with changeable graphic cards featuring bold black-and-white images. They stimulate the optic nerves and encourage cognitive development, while also developing fine motor skills as your baby spins the wheel.  Mirror mode:  As the baby grows up, switch to Mirror mode. A cute mirror with bright primary colors to engage with, improve self-awareness, increase curiosity and provide lots of giggles! As your baby moves the little discs or leaves along the vines, the ladybug moves up and down the tree! Endlessly fascinating, great for dexterity, eye-hand coordination and develops the pincer grasp skill. In early months baby will swat it, and try to grab it. The patterns on the toy create tactile stimulation, important for sensory development. As the baby grows it acts as a teether. The food grade silicone material is a great soother for teething babies. Read more STAGE 2 TOYS (ADVANCED ACTIVITY TOYS)         Soft, monster patterned cloths that can be pulled and pushed to improve fine motor skills, understanding of cause and effect as the baby learns to anticipate which cloth monster will get sucked in when grabbed, eye-hand coordination and provide tactile stimulation through the different fabrics and textures. This poke toy is great for sensory exploration, understanding of cause and effect and improving fine motor skills. The colorful bubbles can be poked and pushed all the way through, keeping babies amused for longer, as well as have a calming effect on the mind. This toy can even be detached from the activity center so that the fun continues anywhere!  Musical Game Mode:  This colorful drum toy has a Monster Sound Mode that lets babies bang on the three buttons, each creating a different monstrous sound.  Game Mode:  As your baby grows, the drum toy can be switched to a game mode to develop cognitive skills. The Musical Game Mode is inspired by whack-a-mole , a favorite from our childhood! One of the three drum pads light up and when pressed on, it goes yay! and if not it says Oh oh!. This game helps with recognition, memory and problem solving skills. Playing is hard work, babies need to snack! This snack bowl encourages self-feeding. It lets children explore and understand food, be visually stimulated, improve fine motor skills and eye-hand coordination, along with better chewing skills. Read more       With our 360 swivel action, your little one can easily spin and turn to reach their favorite toys during their early development stage. The seat is padded, more comfortable, and also stretches for slight bouncing to give a spring in her step! With our 4-level height adjustment, the PortaPlay can keep up with your fast-growing baby.  We recommend your baby to be on tippy toes while in the Activity Center. When she has grown taller with limited room for bouncing, its time to raise the Activity Center one level higher. With a push of a button, you can easily snap out the legs of PortaPlay Play Table and store it away! Read more MATERIAL MATTER! At Oribel, we believe in using the most superior quality materials that last and are least harmful to Mother nature.         Always free from toxic flame retardants, BPA, lead, and phthalates. All mouthable parts are made of food-grade silicone. Our products meet and exceed global safety standards for babies and children  ASTM and EN. All wood used for our products is sustainably sourced from renewable forests. Wood is sealed with a non-toxic finish. We have minimized color printing and lamination on our boxes. While we are forced to use some plastic to keep parts secure, we are constantly looking for better materials. Read more Number of toys 8 toys (11 Play modes) 5 toys 5 toys Storing mechanism Easy to remove legs Easy to fold legs Easy to fold legs 360-degree Rotating Seat    Converts to a table    Bouncy seat 3 inch controlled bounce 3 inch controlled bounce 3 inch controlled bounce Matching stools Available for purchase Available for purchase Available for purchase Additional toys Available for purchase Available for purchase Available for purchase
Features: MULTI STAGE! The PortaPlay Activity Center Monsterland Adventures can be used to Turn, Bounce, Play, Transform, and Fold. All in one product! A product that truly allows your child to explore a whole new world! BOUNCING FUN! Elastic bands within the seat pad allow for your baby to bounce for great fun! The 360 degree seat allows for fun exploration. Your baby will never be bored as he or she spins and turns to play with the various vibrant toys. TRAVEL ACTIVITY CENTER! Did you ever think you could travel with your activity center? Whether you want to go on a weekend trip or simply store away your PortaPlay. The patented legs of the PortaPlay are easily detachable with a press of a button, allowing you to store it in the trunk or in the closet or even under the bed! Go ahead and try, but no other Activity Center will give you this freedom! GROW WITH ME! The PortaPlay Activity Center Monsterland Adventures comes with 2 sets of toys that cater to the growth and developmental needs of your little one as he or she grows. You can also swap the seat with the Table top provided to convert into a Play Table for toddlers up to 5 years old. Use with the PortaPlay Stools and art paper roll dispenser (sold separately) for drawing, sketching, projects, and any imaginative activities your little one can dream up! LEARNING TOYS! The PortaPlay Activity Center Monsterland Adventures features ample toys for your curious little one. The toys are thoughtfully designed to entertain, engage and develop fine motor skills and for cognitive development.

Description: We established Besrey to give parents a better choice of safer and more comfortable baby products. Detachable sheet and side fabric can be easily removed and hand washed, for ultimate ease of use. Read more Read more  Notes:  1. Never leave a child unattended in the bedside sleeper. Always provide the supervision necessary for the continued safety of your child. 2. It is dangerous to place the bedside sleeper on a raised surface such as a table. 3. Do not use the product if any part is broken, torn or missing. 4. Only an adult should assemble, fold and unfold the baby bassinet. 5. Before assembly, check that the product and all of its components have not been damaged during transportation. Should any part be damaged, do not use and keep out of reach of children. 6. Ensure users of this product are knowledgeable on its correct operation. 7. Do not position the bedside sleeper near walls and obstacles to prevent entrapment. Do not adjust the bedside sleeper with a child inside. 8. Do not move the product with a child inside. 9. Do not use the baby bassinet with more than one child at a time. 10. This product is intended for use for babies aged between 0 and 6 months, weighing up to a maximum of 15kg/33lb. When a child is able to sit, kneel or to pull itself up, the product should not be used anymore for this child. 11. The bedside sleeper is designed for use only with adult beds that are between 23.2-31.8 inches(59-81cm) from floor to top of adult mattress. Description: The GoodCook Prep and Freeze Stackable Cube Try This clever ice cube tray is the winner for the 2018 Housewares Design Awards. Description: Essential for baby road trips  Traveling with a baby can be challenging  and even dangerous, if a bored baby screams and distracts the driver. Keep your baby quiet, happy and interested with this interactive car seat toy. Designed to suit babies from birth, this colorful mat has toys to look at, grab and kick, so will entertain newborns and older babies alike. Made to be easy to install, it fits almost any car. Simply attach the 2 plastic rings to the headrest, adjust the height and angle of the toy with the hook and loop fasteners. Securely fastened, the car seat toy for infants will stay within reach but out of the babys face, giving you peace of mind and a chance to concentrate on the road. Description: From day one, your little sprout can have a comfy seat at the dinner table with this convertible high chair. The Ingenuity Beanstalk Baby to Big Kid 6-in-1 High Chair offers 6 grow-with-me modes from newborn up to 5 years of age, including a soothing infant seat specifically designed for newborns. The other modes include a full size high chair with a tray; an infant dining chair that allows baby to join the family at the table without the tray; a chair top high chair; a toddler chair; and two ways to seat two kids. Extra comfy seat padding creates cozy feeding spot for baby. The Beanstalk has two front wheels and is easy to maneuver with one hand when youve got a baby on your hip. The tray is removable and adjusts to 3 different locking positions to keep baby more secure. An adjustable 5-point harness keeps baby tucked in for every mode. Infant seat mode features a toy bar and gentle vibrations to keep baby soothed while you cook. As baby grows, the footrest adjusts to babys height in high chair and toddler chair modes. Mealtime messes are no big dealwith a wipeable seat pad and a BPA-free, dishwasher-safe tray, your Beanstalk will be tidy in a jiffy (but your little sprout might need a bath).
Features: 6 modes of use: Soothing Infant Seat, Full Size High Chair, Infant Dining Chair, Chair Top High Chair, Toddler Chair, and 2 ways to seat 2 kids at once. Use from newborn up to 5 years. Gentle vibrations & toy bar with 2 plush toys in Soothing Infant Seat mode help calm baby. The Infant Seat detaches from the base & folds for easy storage when not in use. Seat 2 kids at once in Soothing Infant Seat & Chair Top High Chair modes and in Chair Top High Chair & Toddler Chair modes. Dishwasher safe, BPA-free tray & wipeable seat pad for easy cleaning. Adjustable 5-point harness keeps baby secure. 2-position adjustable footrest in High Chair & Toddler Chair modes. 3-position recline in High Chair & Chair Top High Chair modes. Easy-to-maneuver front wheels. One-hand removable & adjustable tray with 3 locking positions.

Description: Welcome to the magical world of Disney. Minnie Mouse is featured in this colorful three-piece baby bedding collection. The bedding set includes one quilt (finished at 33 X 42), one fitted crib sheet (52" x 28"), and one crib skirt (Dust Ruffle). It is made of a soft microfiber material that is digitally printed in a high resolution which enhances the colors and is eco-friendly. Minnie Mouse is posing on the right-hand side of the quilt. She is 23 tall and is wearing one of her favorite outfits. Her hot pink shoes and bow coordinate with her pink and white polka dot dress. Minnies face is appliqued in a light beige color velour, her arms and head are black velour, her gloves are white velour and her 8 bow is a hot pink velour. Her eyes, long lashes, nose, and mouth are embroidered in satin stitches. The top of the quilt features three large bows each in different pink and gray patterns. The background of the quilt has scattered small pink stars and geometric splatters. The coordinating fitted crib sheet is on a crisp white ground with tossed Minnie heads, pink hearts, the word Minnie in pink script along with geometric pink splatters. The fitted crib sheet has elastic all the way around ensuring a safe and secure fit on a standard-sized mattress measuring 28 x 52. The pretty pink crib skirt has a 10 drop and white polka dots. The word Minnie is embroidered next to an appliqued Minnie head with her hot pink bow. The applique is 11 X 3.7.

Description: The NEW OmniBoost has it all  portable, versatile, and lightweight! If it aint broke, re-engineer it and make it even better! Thats the hiccapop way. Weve redesigned the OmniBoost with even more safety features, roominess and convenience for parents on the go who want a safe space for their babies to sit, eat, and play. It quickly and securely straps onto any type of adult chair for family mealtimes at tables or pops up to provide a safe floor seat at outdoor events or during play time. Wherever youre sitting, your little one will be comfortable, happy and safe right next to you. And, each OmniBoost is backed by hiccapop for life! Read more         Includes removable duck feet to increase stability on soft or uneven surfaces such as sand and grass. Convenient attachable and detachable, dishwasher safe and BPA-free tray that swivels for hassle-free in and out. Durable fabric, designed to effortlessly wipe clean. Or, remove the cover from frame for machine washing. Large mesh back pocket provides convenient organization space for bibs, baby utensils, wipes, and more! Read more         As an additional safeguard, our new locking mechanism ensures each seat stays locked when fully opened. Weve increased the width of the seating area for greater comfort at mealtime. The new OmniBoosts wider stance adds additional stability while still fitting on dining room chairs. Our newly designed dishwasher safe tray provides more usable surface for meals, drawing and fun! Read more
Features: PORTABLE/TRAVEL-FRIENDLY | Planning a day at the beach, a weekend camping, a visit to Grandmas house, going out to dinner or spending a quiet evening at home? OmniBoost will conveniently, comfortably and safely provide the perfect space for baby to sit, eat, and play. Lightweight FRUSTRATION-FREE folding frame expands and compactly folds down for travel. The rear pocket for bibs & spoons, plus a shoulder carry bag for sanitary storage make the OmniBoost the ideal travel booster chair. COMFORT FIT SAFETY HARNESS | Keep your child fully secured with hiccapops gentle restraint system, ergonomically designed to keep even the most wiggly toddler in place and cozy. Plus, the buckles are easily released using only one hand! MACHINE WASHABLE COVER | We all know that babies are messy eaters! Our portable booster seat is designed to effortlessly wipe clean, allowing more quality time with your precious tot. To assist with the inevitable mess, the fabric cover slides off the frame for machine washing - a must have for sanitizing and spaghetti stain removal. DISHWASHER-SAFE REMOVABLE SWIVEL TRAY | Like a personal dining room on the go, this portable baby chair booster seat comes equipped with a convenient attachable/detachable, dishwasher safe and BPA-free tray that swivels for hassle-free in and out. When your little one grows, remove the tray and boost him up to the kitchen table to eat with the grownups! SUPERIOR TIP-FREE STABILITY | We designed the OmniBoost to have a wide, stable base, but we didnt stop there. We added removable, tip-over prevention duck feet to distribute weight evenly and increase stability on soft or uneven surfaces such as sand and grass.
Output:

Description: This out of this world crib bedding set includes a luxurious quilt/comforter, breathable 100% cotton fitted crib sheet, designer appliqued crib skirt with 16" drop, and a full set of Star Wars logo wall decals. This incredible quilt features a unique view of both inside and outside the Millennium Falcon with large, textured appliques of Chewbacca, C-3PO, and R2-D2. Plus, it is loaded with embroidery details throughout. The breathable 100% cotton gray fitted crib sheet is a tossed print with Chewbacca, C-3PO, R2D2 and the Millennium Falcon. It has elastic all the way around ensuring a safe and secure fit on a standard size crib mattress measuring 52 x 28. The words Star Wars are printed in blue with dark gray outlines. C-3PO is in yellow gold, Chewbacca stands on the letter A with his fists up in the air, Darth Vader patrols the letter W complete with his lightsaber, Yoda stands close by and R2D2 and an Ewok complete this Star Wars Decal. Read more  Star Wars Millennium Falcon 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set Description:  Your little padawan (Jedi-in-training) will love how their nursery is transformed into a Star Wars Millennium Falcon adventure from a galaxy far far away. The four-piece crib bedding set includes one quilt, one breathable 100% cotton fitted crib sheet, one crib skirt and a set of Star Wars logo wall decals. The quilt features a 17 tall Chewbacca made in a high pile fuzzy brown minky fabric complete with his bandolier which is embroidered in black and white. C-3PO is next to him, is 11 in height and is appliqued in a yellow minky fabric with gold embroidery stitches. Our favorite droid, R2D2, is 8  tall and is appliqued with white cotton twill, silver knit and dark blue embroidery stitches. An interior view of the holochess scene of Chewbacca and C-3PO playing Dejarik in the Millenium Falcon is featured on this amazing quilt. The 31 wide couch is behind the holochess table and is trimmed with gray cording. Outside the Millennium Falcon is the misty blue galaxy filled with planets, star dust, X-Wings, Tie Fighters, and the Death Star. The back of the quilt is the dusty blue galaxy in a cotton rich twill. The breathable 100% cotton gray fitted crib sheet is a tossed print with Chewbacca, C-3PO, R2D2 and the Millennium Falcon. It has elastic all the way around ensuring a safe and secure fit on a standard size crib mattress measuring 52 x 28. The blue galaxy crib skirt has a 16 drop and the appliqued Millennium Falcon with embroidered stitching is on the right corner panel. Star Wars logo wall decals are included in this bedding set and has four sheets that are 12 X 18 each. There are 17 pre-cut pieces. The words Star Wars are printed in blue with dark gray outlines. C-3PO is in yellow gold, Chewbacca stands on the letter A with his fists up in the air, Darth Vader patrols the letter W complete with his lightsaber, Yoda stands close by and R2D2 and an Ewok complete this Star Wars Decal. They are easy to apply and will not harm your walls.         Read more  About the Manufacturer:  Lambs & Ivy is proud to be a California based women founded and run business. Lambs & Ivy got its start in 1979 in a quest to bring the world high quality, fashionable nursery bedding, room dcor and products for babies. Lambs & Ivy supports gender and racial diversity throughout everything that we do. We are proud to embody an economically and culturally diverse workforce that is over 50% female. This wonderful mix of backgrounds helps to infuse our products with international fashion trends which appeal to new parents. When you purchase from Lambs & Ivy you can feel good in knowing that you are not only getting high quality baby products, but that you are supporting a business that truly cares about its customers, employees, and the greater community. We have dedicated ourselves to being in tune with the changing trends and tastes of new parents. We understand the responsibility our customers place in us. As parents, we put our hearts and souls into what we create for children; as professionals we apply our expertise to deliver you the style and quality you deserve. Our unique combination of contemporary designs with old fashioned workmanship, personal service, and attention to detail will continue to distinguish us through our next 40 years and beyond. Description: Accessorize baby in contemporary style with this mittens and caps bundle! This set includes six pairs of mittens and six caps. The baby mittens and caps are made with 100% cotton, a soft and safe fabric thats perfect against babys soft and delicate skin. These baby no scratch mittens are perfect to help protect babys face from sharp fingernails. When babies are young, they dont have control over their arm and hand movements which results in a lot of accidental scratches, which often end up on their sweet faces. Ouch! These scratches often happen during sleep. Trimming baby nails is difficult and sometimes near impossible! These mittens are a perfect, safe solution to this issue. They allow parents to safely protect their childs delicate skin in a simple and convenient manner. They feature fabric covered elastic wristbands to keep them held into place. The baby caps are perfect to keep baby snuggly warm. The caps are great to pair with any outfit to add some comfort and warmth. These baby hats feature soft cuffs for a comfortable fit. The baby hand mittens and caps come in a variety of colors, patterns, and designs to suit any outfit. They are perfect to mix and match so that they will look great with any outfit your baby is wearing! Match them up with baby clothes of all kinds including Onesies Brand bodysuits during the day and footies or baby gowns at night! These are baby mittens and caps are perfect for newborns. Description: Plum Organics Mighty 4 pouches, a puree of organic fruits, veggies, protein and grains, are the perfect snack for toddlers. Every pouch is filled with essential nutrients from 4 food group favorites to fuel your active tot. Using only non-GMO, organic ingredients, the gently cooked blends are all unsalted, unsweetened, and kosher parve. Since our pouches are resealable, you can customize portion sizes that are perfect for your baby. Your little ones will love this variety pack of yummy flavors! Ships as a 12-pack of 4-ounce pouches (Banana, Kiwi, Spinach, Greek Yogurt and Barley). At Plum Organics, we're not just delivering nourishing, organic food to your little ones. Were making the world a better place. As a B we believe in using business as a force for good, and that includes our commitment to sustainability. Our non-BPA pouches has a smaller overall environmental footprint than glass jars, using less energy and generating less greenhouse gases during their life cycle. While there is no recyclable pouch film in existence, yet (we're working on it), the caps on our pouches are recyclable and help to prevent food waste. By using our pouches, you're sharing in our commitment to leaving a "baby-sized" footprint on the planet. Plum was founded in 2007, when a small group of parents came together and reimagined the baby food category as we know it today. We introduced the first spouted baby food pouch, with a mission of inspiring a lifetime of healthy eating from the very first bite.

Description: Read more While some popular snacks for babies and toddlers have sugar listed as their second ingredient, our yogurt melt is the first and only on the market with no added sugar.       When we saw the most popular snack for babies and toddlers had sugar as the second ingredient, we knew you--and your little ones--deserved better. With easy, resealable bags, perfect for on-the-go... in line, at the park, waiting for dinner, with guilt-free melts, anytime is yogurt melt time. -Saipro flowers come from the flowering areas along the Pacific Coast where we plant high-yield and high-quality flowers.
-We utilize the most advanced Japan preservation and drying technology to keep the flowers soft and colorful.
-Although it has been picked for a long time, it is still very fresh, looks like fresh flowers.

The Best Gift Choice
-In flower language, caspia symbolizes perfect love.
-Just like a preserved caspia bouquet, love does not easily wither.
-With our bouquet, love will be fresh and everlasting.

Environmental Protection
-Unlike artificial flowers, these dried flowers are 100% natural.
-They are harvested using a non-toxic process, and no harmful chemicals are used to protect your flowers.
-Our flowers are naturally dried, so each flower is unparalleled, and the colors may be a little different from those in the photos.

Warm Space
-This dried flower arrangement can bring warmth to any space and is very suitable for homes, shops, gift boxes, offices, weddings, restaurants, banquet decorations, and photography props.
-It can be used with roses, baby's breath and other dry flowers and artificial flowers. It is widely used as matching flowers in most countries. Of course, It can also be used as a separate bouquet, which is very elegant.

Warming Reminder
-It is natural for some flowers to fall off during long-distance transportation. Please gently separate the flower branches and remove the fallen flowers before use.
-The scattered flowers can be used to make wreaths without any waste. They can be used for crafts or to continue decorating your lives!
-The color of each bunch of flowers is unique. If you are not satisfied, please contact us and we will offer you the best possible solution.

Description: Rustic craftsmanship brings warmth and character to the Paloma 4-in-1 Convertible Crib from Simmons Kids. Impressive details such as crown molding, intricate trim and a full panel headboard add to its charming style. Built to the highest safety standards, the Paloma 4-in-1 Crib is JPMA certified, so you can be comfortably secure in the selection of baby's crib. For additional convenience, this versatile crib features a three-position mattress height adjustment that allows you to lower the mattress as your baby grows, plus it converts into a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed when your child is ready. Pair it with the Paloma 4 Drawer Dresser with Changing Top (sold separately) to complete your nursery. Due to varying wood grains and variations in the hand-applied finish, product might appear slightly different than those shown on site. All Simmons Kids cribs are JPMA certified, and are tested above and beyond industry standards.

Description: Mercase back corrector for Women and men, Comfortable and Powerful, Easy to Correct and Retain a Proper Posture  Well made with premium quality, lightweight, and soft material, this shoulder & back brace feels comfortable on your body. Easy way to get rid of back, shoulder, neck and clavicle pain. Improved body posture can make you appear taller and slimmer. Elastic design makes it easy to fasten for a perfect and comfortable fit. Wearing under your clothes, provides clavicle posture support for all activities including working out and sitting at your computer desk. Read more  FAQ ABOUT MERCASE BACK BRACE POSTURE CORRECTOR   Q: Can I wear it for 2 hours a day?  A: You can start wearing it for 30 minutes at a time, then gradually increase the wearing time by 30 minutes to 2 hours per day. Do not wear while sleeping. If you feel uncomfortable, stop using it immediately.  Q: Does this help lower back and shoulders?  A: It works if you wear it regularly. It will stretch your shoulders and back and you will find it improves your poor posture.  Q: Does this rub or irritate under the arms? Can it relieve lower and upper back pain?  A:  The mercase posture corrector adds an adjustable underarm strap so you can adjust the comfort level. Say goodbye to painful underarm problems.  Q: Is this sweaty and chafe in the summer?  A: Like anything that wraps your body for wearing it too long it will be sweaty. But in the instructions you are only suppose to wear this harness about 1-2hours for the day so there is no need to wear it for so long. The harness doesnt chafe as long as you get the correct measurements and since its over your clothes and not rubbing against your skin it doesnt hurt.  Q: Can I wear under clothes?  A: Although the material of our products is very soft and breathable and comfortable, we recommend that you wear them over a t-shirt for safety reasons as everyone has different skin sensitivities.  Q: How do you determine the size needed?  A: We do not recommend choosing the size of the posture corrector according to the size of your usual clothes, please use a tape measure to actually measure your lower bust and get the size that suits you according to the product size chart. Features Strong Support No armpit pain Lightweight and Comfortable SIZE M,L,XL(26.7-49.2 M,L,XL(23"-50") L,XL(32-50) Support Plates 2 support plates 2 support plates 2 support plates come with a extension belt    Elasticity grade Heavier Heavy Medium with a underarm adjustment strap
Features: Keep Your Back Straight & Perfect Your Posture: Mercase kyphosis corrector brace help you open your shoulder,Keep reminding you to exercise your back muscles,and form muscle memory to get rid of bad posture, A healthy upright posture makes you look taller and makes you more confident. Fix Posture and Effectively Relief Pain : Double cross design of the back straps and 2 strong auxiliary support bars in the padded back strip provides support from all angles and gently disperse the tension you need for alignment and stability without hurting the back, which helps relieve back, neck, shoulders pain. Posture Corrector Armpit Comfortable: The Mercase back brace adopts No Armpits Pain design, with a new underarm adjustment strap, which can be adjusted according to your comfort. Description: The Support Your Back Needs There is nothing quite as frustrating as dealing with chronic back pain. Its one of those overwhelming injuries that doesnt just feel awful. It can be detrimental to your quality of life. Whats worse is that the pain doesnt simply get better with time. It can persist for years even with doctor visits, surgeries, physical rehabilitation, and other back support belts. Fortunately, not ALL back braces are designed to support your back in the same way. While you might not experience any relief with one brand its very likely you can feel a HUGE difference with the Sparthos back brace. Meaning you dont have to keep settling for minimal results. You can start the real journey to healing today. All you need to do is to give this brace a try. Feel Comfortable Sitting, Walking, Or Lifting The Sparthos support belt provides an external source of stability so youre able to perform any of lifes daily movements without the slightest stiffness. Whether you want to put your shoes on, do chores around the house, or lift weights at the gym. Heck, you could begin doing the things you love again: playing basketball, going for a run, or gardening. Imagine the possibilities. A lot of back braces become unbearably hot with intense activity or prolonged use. Thats why we designed our braces with breathable fabrics.
